summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Seattle & Rainier Valley Railway Company to surrender and release the franchise granted by Ordinance No. 20586 covering the right to operate on King Street from Rainier Avenue to Fifth Avenue South; accepting such surrender when filed, releasing the Seattle & Rainier Valley Railway Company, its successors and assigns, from all obligations and liabilities imposed by said Ordinance No. 20586, and authorizing the removal of the tracks from said route.
